game-info.name: The Peril
game-info.welcome: Welcome to the Peril. Enter at your own risk...

commands.name: walk
commands.description: Moves the player in a direction.

commands.name: pickup
commands.description: Places something in the player's pocket.

commands.name: inventory
commands.description: List the contents of the players pocket.

nodes.name: living room
nodes.description: You are in the living room. A wizard is snorning loudly on the couch.

nodes.name: garden
nodes.description: You are in a beautiful garden. There is a well in front of you.

nodes.name: attic
nodes.description: You are in the attic. There is a giant welding a torch in the corner.
